tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Coming to this dental clinic has made me trust online ratings, all the more! I didn't know about Dr. Ashitesh and Dr. Meghna, until I saw the wonderful reviews on Practo and decided to give it a try. I had a bad tooth ache that needed a root canal and cap. My first! And, both Dr. Ashitesh and Dr. Meghana made it so easy, efficient, comfortable and clinical! They know their job; they are keen, minute observers; they are super sensitive to the patient's needs; and they are energetic and agile! They also have a very professional nursing team and front desk - note that I've visited them during the pandemic and their safety precautions are precise (read: I say this as a doctor myself!). Finally, my recent visits were time sensitive - I'm shifting to another city, and I was sceptical of completing all the necessary procedures before the end of the month. But, given their sharpness, efficiency and a well planned treatment, Dr. Ashitesh and Dr. Meghana made it possible and perfect! I would recommend them to everyone. Look no further :)
reply_text: Thank you Ameyaüòä Reading this kind of feedback is very rewarding! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. It was delight treating you. We are here anytime you need us. Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I have been coming to visit them quite often from Andheri. I have never been kept waiting for my appointment. With regards to me dental health, all of my doubts are always cleared and I've had the best treatment there so far. I plan to get my invisaligns from them and they were really helpful with explaining to me the entire procedure, what to expect from it and how to tackle minor hiccups along the way if need be.  I will further comment once I start my procedure but so far I would definitely recommend them for any dental or orthodontic treatment.

review: This was my first visit to Dr Ashitesh and Dr Meghana's clinic. I was really short on time as I was traveling and had to undergo a root canal treatment. Dr Ashitesh and Dr Meghana were exceptionally patient with me and went the extra mile to ensure the treatment was completed in a week also ensuring the cap was manufactured from the vendor in such a short notice. I totally admire them for their friendly approach and taking time out to explain the entire procedure step by step. Kudos to Ashitesh and Meghana. Keep up the good work!!

Dr.Ashitesh explained me the entire process & given me confidence that he would help me out through this & he made his words. I am very delighted with the Braces Treatment. Dr. Ashitesh is an amazing, kind, caring, friendly, co-operative & humble. He listens to the problem & give solution accordingly. It was pleasant experience, I am overall satisfied with the treatment procedure, cleanliness, appointment, staff, no waiting time etc. The treatment is worth the Money. Thank you so much Dr. Ashitesh Sir for all your kindness throughout, nobody would have done my treatment as you did.
I highly recommend Dr. Ashitesh Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Ashitesh Kumar was quite informative on our first meet. He explained all procedure and told about the problems too. 

NOTE: For those who don't know , braces can be used till you are under 25 yrs old, after that your mouth can't be that flexible to treat properly.So, plzz notify that.

He is pretty helpful and calm during his treatment, and knows how to handle his patients. Cleanliness and safety procedure at his clinic is nice & clean too.

So, I would recommend you to consult Dr.Ashitesh in case of any oral problem.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Ritesh. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. We are glad we could solve all your queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Ashitesh's father is our family physician since several years. The proximity of a physician with a dentist is the most important aspect that has prompted many of us to take dental treatment with Dr Ashitesh. This enables overcome the wait time that is associated with surgeries, implants etc that require tests to ascertain medical history of the patient and avoiding many routine yet time consuming tests is possible.
The other aspects marked above are very true. Dr Ashitesh and his team have fulfilled the aspects of keeping appointments, sending reminders, rescheduling when required. 
The friendliness of the dentist gets full score as also the explanation of the health issue to the patient. The cost aspects hence get addressed.
reply_text: Thank you so much for this amazing review. It made our day. It was delight to treat you. Keep smiling üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Both Ashitesh and Meghna are very professional, have the latest equipment, extremely approachable and have a soothing bedside manner with patients.   My daughters (aged 6 and 4 respectively -  never been to a dentist before, and who had an irrational fear of doctors) instantly felt at ease with both Ashitesh and Meghna, making the whole experience very  smooth and tireless. 

What I specifically appreciated was this  - Ashitesh did not suggest any extra /unnecessary treatment for my girls, instead preferring the approach of, 'we'll intervene when required'. This attitude of not trying to fix something  that's not yet broken, really appealed to me.

I'd highly recommend their services to anyone looking for good, competent dental care in the Chembur area.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. The girls were adorable üòç Glad you had good experience with us

review: ** ** ************* ******* ** ***** ***** *** ** ********. They gave me a bill of 23k for root canal and cap. ****** ** *** *********** ********* *** ***** ** *******. *** *** **** ** ***** **** ***** ******** ******** *******. Regarding the treatment: He first said my tooth cannot be saved, then changed his mind and said that root canal can be performed. After getting the root canal, my tooth broke. So whole thing was total loss of money for me.
reply_text:
The bills provided to you was for not only the Root canal and Crown but also Crown lengthening and fibre post. The last two procedures were added because the prognosis of the tooth was questionable, which was explained in detail to you prior to starting the procedure.
After you visited us for the first appointment of the root canal procedure where cleaning was done by us and a temporary cement was placed and we had scheduled the next appointment, for which you did not turn up nor bothered to reply to calls and messages from our clinic. Finally when the tooth broke due to your negligence you decided to post a review on practo.

review:
Prompt service by Dr Ashitesh Kumar and team, as they are quite knowledgeable, communicative and efficient. Treatment was done gently and Dr Kumar also made sure that I feel super comfortable during the treatment. I had gone in for an emergency appointment, I got a quick diagnosis and my dental concern was addressed within 20 minutes. Would recommend for the best service and a great ambience.
Thankyou and Kudos to you and your team.

Monika Parmar.

review: Informs the problem faced as part of diagnosis and also with x-ray. In no hurry to finish treatment.   Gives time for healing. Avoids drugs as far as possible.
